name: react-starter
description: React 同构脚手架（内置基础的网站功能，让大家更快上手）

scripts.dev: cross-env __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=server webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.development.config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.pro: NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=client webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.production.config.js && NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.dev1: BABEL_ENV=server webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.development.config.js --mode=development && NODE_ENV=development __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.pro1: BABEL_ENV=client webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.production.config.js --mode=production && NODE_ENV=production __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server node src/server
scripts.devs: __NODE__=false BABEL_ENV=server webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.development.config.js && __NODE__=true BABEL_ENV=server webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.server.development.config.js && node ./dist/server/server.js

author: sword <54sword@163.com>
